verbs.description: Ever since Donald Trump [V: was] elected president there has been a debate over whether his frequently absurd comments were the result of his shameless dishonesty or his evident psychological degradation . Of course these are not mutually exclusive ...

Ever since [ARG1: Donald Trump] was [V: elected] [ARG2: president] there has been a debate over whether his frequently absurd comments were the result of his shameless dishonesty or his evident psychological degradation . Of course these are not mutually exclusive ...

Ever since Donald Trump was elected president there [V: has] been a debate over whether his frequently absurd comments were the result of his shameless dishonesty or his evident psychological degradation . Of course these are not mutually exclusive ...

[ARGM-TMP: Ever since Donald Trump was elected president] there has [V: been] [ARG1: a debate over whether his frequently absurd comments were the result of his shameless dishonesty or his evident psychological degradation] . Of course these are not mutually exclusive ...

Ever since Donald Trump was elected president there has been a debate over whether [ARG1: his frequently absurd comments] [V: were] [ARG2: the result of his shameless dishonesty or his evident psychological degradation] . Of course these are not mutually exclusive ...

Ever since Donald Trump was elected president there has been a debate over whether his frequently absurd comments were the result of his shameless dishonesty or his evident psychological degradation . [ARGM-ADV: Of course] [ARG1: these] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: mutually exclusive] ...
